author: Mandy S
title: Good hotel in Rome -
text:
Good location within walking distance of the railway station, very handy if you've used the Leonardo Express from Fumincino airport. Spotlessly clean, very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Very modern decor, minimalist style, could perhaps do with a bit more storage space but this is a minor detail. Breakfast very good and lots to choose from. We used city sightseeing tour bus over 48 hours to hop on and off, pick up point just beside railway station and then the metro to get to the Vatican on the 3rd day, again just a short walk. We used taxi's in the evening to go to different areas for meals, the staff arranged this within minutes and the cost of the taxi was reasonable. (Much less than a recent trip in London!) Local restaurants to the hotel were good but a bit limited, might be better later in the season. Thoroughly enjoyed Rome.
Room Tip: We had a room facing the front road at times was a bit noisy to be expected in a capital city, rear... See more room tips
